containerOverrides.name: control-center
command: echo 'Connecting to DB...' && psql "$DATABASE_URL" -c "INSERT INTO schema_migrations (filename, sha256, applied_at) VALUES ('001_initial_schema.sql', 'manual-seed', NOW()) ON CONFLICT (filename) DO UPDATE SET sha256 = EXCLUDED.sha256;" && echo 'Verifying...' && psql "$DATABASE_URL" -c "SELECT filename, sha256, applied_at FROM schema_migrations;"
